item.title: Uninstall all the gems
item.description: From time to time I need to uninstall all my gems within RVM gemset. I googled a nice command for this: # gem list | cut -d" " -f1 | xargs gem uninstall -aIx Then I usually go for: # gem install bundler && bundle install Easy peasy. Kudos to geekystuff.net. Thanks.
